<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">

        <name>FHCheckSecurity</name>
        <sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable>
        <script><![CDATA[var FHCheckSecurity = Class.create();
FHCheckSecurity.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.utils = new FHScanUtils();
        this.optionsHandler = new FHOptionsHandler();
    },

    /**
     * execute(ctx)
     * Security checks entrypoint. Requires table to exist.
     */
    execute: function(ctx) {
        if (!ctx) return;
        ctx.registerCategory('security', 'Security', 'fa-shield-alt');
        var tablesToCheck = ctx.getTablesToCheck();
        this._checkACLs(ctx, tablesToCheck);
    },

    /**
     * _checkACLs - collect ACLs in the table hierarchy and compute summaries.
     */
    _checkACLs: function(ctx, tablesToCheck) {
        var tableName = ctx.getTableName && ctx.getTableName();

        var acls = [];
        var aclsByOperation = {
            read: 0,
            write: 0,
            create: 0,
            delete: 0
        };
        var sncByOperation = {
            read: 0,
            write: 0,
            create: 0,
            delete: 0
        };

        // Build a GlideRecord query for ACLs affecting the table or parents.
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl');

        // Construct an encoded query: name starting with tableName or any parent table
        var encoded = '';
        for (var i = 0; i < tablesToCheck.length; i++) {
            var tbl = tablesToCheck[i];
            if (i > 0) encoded += '^OR';
            encoded += 'name=' + tbl + '^ORnameSTARTSWITH' + tbl + '.';
        }
        gr.addEncodedQuery(encoded);
        gr.addQuery('active', true);
        gr.query();

        while (gr.next()) {
            var aclName = ctx.safeGetValue ? ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'name') : gr.getValue('name');
            var operation = ctx.safeGetValue ? ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'operation') : gr.getValue('operation');

            // determine which table this ACL is primarily for (closest match in hierarchy)
            var aclTable = tableName;
            for (var j = 0; j < tablesToCheck.length; j++) {
                if (aclName.indexOf(tablesToCheck[j]) === 0) {
                    aclTable = tablesToCheck[j];
                    break;
                }
            }

            var aclInfo = {
                sys_id: gr.getUniqueValue(),
                name: aclName,
                table: aclTable,
                inherited: (aclTable !== tableName),
                operation: operation,
                admin_overrides: (ctx.safeGetValue ? ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'admin_overrides') === 'true' : gr.getValue('admin_overrides') === 'true'),
                condition: (ctx.safeGetValue ? !!ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'condition') : !!gr.getValue('condition')),
                sys_created_by: ctx.safeGetValue ? ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'sys_created_by') : gr.getValue('sys_created_by'),
                sys_updated_by: ctx.safeGetValue ? ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'sys_updated_by') : gr.getValue('sys_updated_by')
            };

            if (ctx.isIgnoreSncRecordsEnabled && ctx.isIgnoreSncRecordsEnabled() &&
                this.utils.isSncRecord && this.utils.isSncRecord(aclInfo)) {
                if (operation && sncByOperation.hasOwnProperty(operation)) sncByOperation[operation]++;
                continue;
            }

            acls.push(aclInfo);

            if (operation && aclsByOperation.hasOwnProperty(operation)) {
                aclsByOperation[operation]++;
            }
        }

        this.utils.addCategoryAndMetrics(ctx, 'security', 'acl', 'ACLs', acls, {
            table: 'sys_security_acl',
            icon: 'fa-lock',
            color: '#dc3545'
        });

        if (aclsByOperation.read === 0) {
            // Si ignore SNC et seules ACL SNC existent, ne pas lever l'issue
            if (!(ctx.isIgnoreSncRecordsEnabled && ctx.isIgnoreSncRecordsEnabled() && sncByOperation.read > 0)) {
                ctx.addIssue('NO_READ_ACL', 'No read ACL defined for this table or its parents', 'medium', {
                    record_table: 'sys_security_acl',
                    record_filter: 'nameSTARTSWITH' + tableName,
                    category: 'security'
                });
            }
        }
        if (aclsByOperation.write === 0) {
            if (!(ctx.isIgnoreSncRecordsEnabled && ctx.isIgnoreSncRecordsEnabled() && sncByOperation.write > 0)) {
                ctx.addIssue('NO_WRITE_ACL', 'No write ACL defined for this table or its parents', 'medium', {
                    record_table: 'sys_security_acl',
                    record_filter: 'nameSTARTSWITH' + tableName,
                    category: 'security'
                });
            }
        }
    },

    type: 'FHCheckSecurity'
};]]></script>
